We collect the following data to provide: We collect the following data to provide accurate health insights:
Personal Information: Name, email addres: Personal Information: Name, email address, and optional health conditions (e.g., diabetes, hypertension) provided during account creation or profile updates.
Health and Dietary Data: Weight, height,: Health and Dietary Data: Weight, height, dietary goals, and food photo uploads for calorie and ingredient analysis.
Usage Data: IP address, browser type, de: Usage Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and interaction logs (e.g., meal logs, search history) collected automatically.
Shared Data: Information shared via SNS: Shared Data: Information shared via SNS for coupon issuance, subject to your consent.
We use your data to enhance your experie: We use your data to enhance your experience, including:
Providing personalized calorie and ingre: Providing personalized calorie and ingredient analysis based on uploaded photos.
Recommending dietary adjustments for und: Recommending dietary adjustments for underlying conditions (e.g., avoiding high-sugar foods for diabetes).
Issuing coupons upon SNS sharing and man: Issuing coupons upon SNS sharing and managing subscription benefits.
Improving our AI models and Service thro: Improving our AI models and Service through aggregated, anonymized data.
Ensuring compliance with legal obligatio: Ensuring compliance with legal obligations and responding to requests from authorities.
We share data responsibly to maintain yo: We share data responsibly to maintain your trust, including:
Service Providers: Third-party vendors (: Service Providers: Third-party vendors (e.g., cloud hosting, payment processors) under confidentiality agreements.
Legal Requirements: Disclosure to comply: Legal Requirements: Disclosure to comply with laws, regulations, or legal processes.
Business Transfers: Data may be transfer: Business Transfers: Data may be transferred in case of mergers or acquisitions, with notice provided.
Aggregated Data: Anonymized data shared: Aggregated Data: Anonymized data shared with partners for research or marketing, without identifiable details.
We protect your data with robust measure: We protect your data with robust measures, including:
Encrypting personal and health data usin: Encrypting personal and health data using industry-standard protocols (e.g., AES-256).
Storing data securely with access contro: Storing data securely with access controls and regular security audits.
Complying with GDPR, CCPA, and other rel: Complying with GDPR, CCPA, and other relevant data protection regulations.
You have control over your data, includi: You have control over your data, including:
Accessing, updating, or deleting your pe: Accessing, updating, or deleting your personal information via the Settings page.
Opting out of marketing communications o: Opting out of marketing communications or data sharing for research.
Requesting data portability or restricti: Requesting data portability or restriction of processing by contacting support@nutrisnap.com.
Withdrawing consent for non-essential da: Withdrawing consent for non-essential data use at any time.
